oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Howard Institute student body
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Photograph of students and faculty gathered outside of the Howard Institute in Mount Pleasant, Tennessee. Some can be seen sitting in the windowsills on the first and second stories. Text towards the bottom of the photograph reads "Howard Institute, Mt. Pleasant, Tenn." and "Pub. by the Williams Drug Co., Mt. Pleasant, Tenn." The school was named after Bithal Howard.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Group portraits; Students; Schools; Teachers
